Detailed Rules

3 Steps to play

1. Install Wallett
Install Phoenix Wallet for Signum

Phoenix is the easy to use wallet for Signum

2. Create Account
Create a new Account with Phoenix

Phoenix will guide you through the creation of your own personal Signum Account.
Be sure to save the newly-generated passphrase.
This is your key to access your Signum Account,so never share it!

3. Load Signa
Load your Account with Signa

To play you need Signa in your SignumAccount to pay for the bets and some very low transaction fees.
Buy your Signa via BTDEX or BITTREX.

Game Rules

Simplfied Black Jack Rules

Aces = 11 points
No split
No double
If draw: bank wins
Bank and players stop drawing cars at 17

Taking Bank Ownership

If a player make bank go bankrupt he takes bank ownership

He will receive the previous bank money in his walett

His current bet becomes the bank amount

Having Bank Ownership

Because bank has Higher chance of winning, having bank ownership can be very rewarding

If bank win:
- 1/5 of bet is send to the bank's owner wallet
- 1/5 of bet is send to the jackpot
- 3/5 is add to the bank's money

Winning Jackpot

Even if player have lower chances of winning against the bank, they can win the current jackpot

If a player make bank go bankrupt he takes bank ownership and inw the jackpot

Examples

Example 1


OwnerShip: Justin with amout: 20
John wallet: 100
John bets 10 and win
----- Result:
OwnerShip: Justin with Amount: 10
John wallet: 110

Example 2


OwnerShip: Justin with amout: 20
John wallet: 100
John bets 30 and win
----- Result:
OwnerShip: John with Amount: 30
John wallet: 90 because 100-30 (bet) + 20 (win from the bank)

Example 3


OwnerShip: Justin with amout: 20
Justin wallet: 0
Jackpot: 0
John wallet: 100
John bets 50 and loose
----- Result:
OwnerShip: Justin with Amount: 50 because 20 + 30 (3/5 of the bet)
Justin wallet: 10 (1/5 of the bet)
Jackpot: 10 (1/5 of the bet)
John wallet: 50
